languages.text: "Я понесу братьям и сестрам просвящение! В реликварии оказалось столько книг о вере, сколько я гаек в жизни не видел! Я читаю их днями и ночами, и слова их сами застревают в уме! Клянусь, в жизни столько ни читал... А книг, кажется, становится все больше, будто они из воздуха берутся! Там и молитвы, и особые знаки священной силы..." {n}Исповедник с гордостью указывает на отметины на своем теле.{/n} "Знанием этим надо делиться! И я поделюсь!"

"I will bring enlightenment to my brothers and sisters! I swear, this shrine has more books on faith than I've seen nuts and bolts on this ship! I read them day and night, and I remember their words so clearly, as if they have become impressed on my mind! I've never read this much in my life... And the books — new ones just keep appearing. I don't even know where they're coming from! They have prayers in them, and signs filled with sacred power..." {n}He proudly points at the marks all over his body.{/n} "This knowledge must be shared! And I will share it!"

Я читаю их днями и ночами, и слова их сами застревают в уме! Клянусь, в жизни столько ни читал... А книг, кажется, становится все больше, будто они из воздуха берутся! They have prayers in them, and signs filled with sacred power..." {n}He proudly points at the marks all over his body.{/n} "This knowledge must be shared! And I will share it!"

languages.text: "Ich werde meine Brüder und Schwestern erleuchten! Ich schwöre, in diesem Schrein gibt es mehr Glaubensbücher als es auf diesem Schiff Nieten und Bolzen gibt. Ich lese sie tagein, tagaus und erinnere mich an die Worte so klar, als wären sie in meinen Verstand gedruckt. Früher habe ich nicht so viel gelesen ... Und die Bücher ... ständig tauchen neue auf. Ich weiß nicht einmal, woher sie kommen! Sie enthalten Gebete und Symbole voller heiliger Macht ..." {n}Er zeigt stolz auf die Male auf seinem Körper.{/n} "Dieses Wissen muss geteilt werden! Und genau das werde ich tun!"
languages.original_text: "I will bring enlightenment to my brothers and sisters! I swear, this shrine has more books on faith than I've seen nuts and bolts on this ship! I read them day and night, and I remember their words so clearly, as if they have become impressed on my mind! I've never read this much in my life... And the books — new ones just keep appearing. I don't even know where they're coming from! They have prayers in them, and signs filled with sacred power..." {n}He proudly points at the marks all over his body.{/n} "This knowledge must be shared! And I will share it!"

Ich lese sie tagein, tagaus und erinnere mich an die Worte so klar, als wären sie in meinen Verstand gedruckt. Früher habe ich nicht so viel gelesen ... Und die Bücher ... ständig tauchen neue auf. Ich weiß nicht einmal, woher sie kommen! Sie enthalten Gebete und Symbole voller heiliger Macht ..." {n}Er zeigt stolz auf die Male auf seinem Körper.{/n} "Dieses Wissen muss geteilt werden! Und genau das werde ich tun!"

languages.text: « Je vais apporter l'illumination à mes frères et sœurs ! Il y a plus de livres sur la foi dans ce sanctuaire que d'écrous et de boulons sur tout un vaisseau ! Je les ai tous lus, et je m'en souviens comme s'ils étaient gravés dans mon esprit ! Je n'avais jamais autant lu de toute ma vie... Et les livres... Il y en a toujours de nouveaux. Je ne sais même pas d'où ils sortent ! Ce sont majoritairement des livres de prières, contenant aussi des symboles imbus de puissance sacrée... » {n}Il désigne les marques qui couvrent son corps.{/n} « Cette connaissance doit être partagée ! Et je compte bien m'en charger ! »
languages.original_text: "I will bring enlightenment to my brothers and sisters! I swear, this shrine has more books on faith than I've seen nuts and bolts on this ship! I read them day and night, and I remember their words so clearly, as if they have become impressed on my mind! I've never read this much in my life... And the books — new ones just keep appearing. I don't even know where they're coming from! They have prayers in them, and signs filled with sacred power..." {n}He proudly points at the marks all over his body.{/n} "This knowledge must be shared! And I will share it!"

traits.locale_text: « Je vais apporter l'illumination à mes frères et sœurs ! Il y a plus de livres sur la foi dans ce sanctuaire que d'écrous et de boulons sur tout un vaisseau ! Je les ai tous lus, et je m'en souviens comme s'ils étaient gravés dans mon esprit ! Je n'avais jamais autant lu de toute ma vie... Et les livres... Il y en a toujours de nouveaux. Je ne sais même pas d'où ils sortent ! Ce sont majoritairement des livres de prières, contenant aussi des symboles imbus de puissance sacrée... » {n}Il désigne les marques qui couvrent son corps.{/n} « Cette connaissance doit être partagée ! Et je compte bien m'en charger ! »

languages.text: «¡Traeré la iluminación a mis hermanos! Lo juro, ¡en este altar hay más libros que tuercas y tornillos en la nave! Los leo día y noche, y los recuerdo claramente, ¡como si se hubieran quedado grabados en mi mente! No he leído tanto en mi vida... Y los libros... no paran de aparecer ejemplares nuevos. ¡No sé de dónde salen! Están repletos de oraciones y signos llenos de poder sagrado...». {n}Indica orgulloso las marcas que cubren su cuerpo.{/n} «Hay que compartir este conocimiento, ¡y voy a compartirlo!».
languages.original_text: "I will bring enlightenment to my brothers and sisters! I swear, this shrine has more books on faith than I've seen nuts and bolts on this ship! I read them day and night, and I remember their words so clearly, as if they have become impressed on my mind! I've never read this much in my life... And the books — new ones just keep appearing. I don't even know where they're coming from! They have prayers in them, and signs filled with sacred power..." {n}He proudly points at the marks all over his body.{/n} "This knowledge must be shared! And I will share it!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Traeré la iluminación a mis hermanos! Lo juro, ¡en este altar hay más libros que tuercas y tornillos en la nave! Los leo día y noche, y los recuerdo claramente, ¡como si se hubieran quedado grabados en mi mente! No he leído tanto en mi vida... Y los libros... no paran de aparecer ejemplares nuevos. ¡No sé de dónde salen! Están repletos de oraciones y signos llenos de poder sagrado...». {n}Indica orgulloso las marcas que cubren su cuerpo.{/n} «Hay que compartir este conocimiento, ¡y voy a compartirlo!».

languages.text: 「私は同胞たちに悟りをもたらしましょう！誓って言いますが、この神殿には信仰に関する本が、この船で見かけたナットやボルトよりもたくさんあるのです！私はそれらを日夜読みふけり、その言葉を、心に刻み込まれた彼のように鮮明に覚えています！こんなにも本を読んだのは人生で初めてです。そして本は…新たなものが、どんどん出てくるのです。それがどこから来ているのかもわかりません！そこには祈りの言葉と、聖なる力に満ちた印が書かれているのです…」{n}彼は自身の体中に描かれた印を誇らしげに示す。{/n}「この知識は広めるべきものです！私が広めましょう！」
languages.original_text: "I will bring enlightenment to my brothers and sisters! I swear, this shrine has more books on faith than I've seen nuts and bolts on this ship! I read them day and night, and I remember their words so clearly, as if they have become impressed on my mind! I've never read this much in my life... And the books — new ones just keep appearing. I don't even know where they're coming from! They have prayers in them, and signs filled with sacred power..." {n}He proudly points at the marks all over his body.{/n} "This knowledge must be shared! And I will share it!"

traits.locale_text: 「私は同胞たちに悟りをもたらしましょう！誓って言いますが、この神殿には信仰に関する本が、この船で見かけたナットやボルトよりもたくさんあるのです！私はそれらを日夜読みふけり、その言葉を、心に刻み込まれた彼のように鮮明に覚えています！こんなにも本を読んだのは人生で初めてです。そして本は…新たなものが、どんどん出てくるのです。それがどこから来ているのかもわかりません！そこには祈りの言葉と、聖なる力に満ちた印が書かれているのです…」{n}彼は自身の体中に描かれた印を誇らしげに示す。{/n}「この知識は広めるべきものです！私が広めましょう！」

languages.text: “我要为我的兄弟姐妹们带来启迪！说真的，这座圣殿里关于信仰的书，甚至比我在船上见过的螺栓螺母还要多！我日日夜夜地读着这些书，书上的话语记得清清楚楚，就好像已经深深地印在我脑子里一样！我这辈子都没读过这么多书……而且新书还在不断涌现，我甚至根本不知道那些书是从哪里来的！那些书上记载着祷文，还有充满神圣力量的印记……”{n}他骄傲地指着他全身的符号。{/n}“这些知识必须和大家分享！我会传播出去的！”
languages.original_text: "I will bring enlightenment to my brothers and sisters! I swear, this shrine has more books on faith than I've seen nuts and bolts on this ship! I read them day and night, and I remember their words so clearly, as if they have become impressed on my mind! I've never read this much in my life... And the books — new ones just keep appearing. I don't even know where they're coming from! They have prayers in them, and signs filled with sacred power..." {n}He proudly points at the marks all over his body.{/n} "This knowledge must be shared! And I will share it!"

traits.locale_text: “我要为我的兄弟姐妹们带来启迪！说真的，这座圣殿里关于信仰的书，甚至比我在船上见过的螺栓螺母还要多！我日日夜夜地读着这些书，书上的话语记得清清楚楚，就好像已经深深地印在我脑子里一样！我这辈子都没读过这么多书……而且新书还在不断涌现，我甚至根本不知道那些书是从哪里来的！那些书上记载着祷文，还有充满神圣力量的印记……”{n}他骄傲地指着他全身的符号。{/n}“这些知识必须和大家分享！我会传播出去的！”

languages.text: "Kardeşlerime aydınlanma getireceğim! Yemin ediyorum ki bu mabetteki inanç üzerine yazılmış kitap sayısı, gemide gördüğüm somun ve cıvata sayısından fazladır! Gece gündüz okuyorum ve sözlerini net bir şekilde aklıma yazıyorum. Tıpkı zihnime işlenmişler gibi! Hayatım boyunca hiç bu kadar çok şey okumamıştım. Ve kitaplar... Yenileri ortaya çıkıp duruyor. Nereden geldiklerini bilmiyorum bile! İçleri dualarla ve kutsal güçlere sahip işaretlerle doldu." {n}Vücudundaki işaretleri gururla gösteriyor.{/n} "Bu irfan paylaşılmalı! Ve paylaşacağım da!"
languages.original_text: "I will bring enlightenment to my brothers and sisters! I swear, this shrine has more books on faith than I've seen nuts and bolts on this ship! I read them day and night, and I remember their words so clearly, as if they have become impressed on my mind! I've never read this much in my life... And the books — new ones just keep appearing. I don't even know where they're coming from! They have prayers in them, and signs filled with sacred power..." {n}He proudly points at the marks all over his body.{/n} "This knowledge must be shared! And I will share it!"
